imdb.plot outline: The parents of Days Kelly (played by Snigdha Suvarna) have won the billion dollar lottery ticket. Instead of investing or saving that money, they decided to go on a luxurious vacation while leaving their daughter Daya to live with a long lost relative Dave Smith (played by Scott Huard). Throughout the episodes the two have to figure out how to resolve their conflicts.
imdb.title: Dave and Daya's Dilemma
plot: The parents of Days Kelly (played by Snigdha Suvarna) have won the billion dollar lottery ticket. Instead of investing or saving that money, they decided to go on a luxurious vacation while leaving their daughter Daya to live with a long lost relative Dave Smith (played by Scott Huard). Throughout the episodes the two have to figure out how to resolve their conflicts.
